content: पृच् {vI.v} {c2c} <ab>A.</ab> (पृक्ते, पृक्ण) To come in contact with. {vII.v} {c7c} <ab>P.</ab> (पृणक्ति, पृक्त) {@--1@} To bring into contact with, join, unite; एवं वदन् दाशरथिरपृणग्धनुषा शरं <ls>Bk. 6. 39.</ls> {@--2@} To mix, mingle. {@--3@} To be in contact with, touch. {@--4@} To satisfy, fill, satiate. {@--5@} To augment, increase. {@--6@} Ved To give or grant bountifully. {vIII.v} {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> (पर्चति, पर्चयति-ते) {@--1@} To touch come in contact with. {@--2@} To hinder oppose.
